mapper.select: SELECT MBR_ID AS memberId, MBR_GRD_NO AS memberGrdNum, MBR_PW AS memberPw, MBR_NM AS memberName, MBR_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, MBR_EML_ADDR AS memberEmail, MBR_TELNO AS memberTelNum, MBR_REG_YMD AS memberRegDate, MBR_MDFCN_YMD AS memberFormDate FROM MEMBER_MANAGE WHERE MBR_ID = #{memberId};
/* 회원 등급 조회 */ SELECT MBR_GRD_NO AS memberGrdNum, MBR_GRD_NM AS memberLevelName FROM MEMBER_GRADE
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_MANAGE SET MBR_PW = #{memberPw}, MBR_NM = #{memberName}, MBR_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}, MBR_EML_ADDR = #{memberEmail}, MBR_TELNO = #{memberTelNum}, MBR_MDFCN_YMD = NOW() WHERE MBR_ID = #{memberId}
